GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-48.73N 006-35.96E ON 26 SEP.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG, IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG
   AND TO MDAT-GOGC, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 060127Z OCT 17.
